text:
2018 has been a year of love stories and fairytale endings. It all started with Sonam Kapoor and Anand Ahuja who tied the knot early this year. And since then, there has been a flurry of A-lister weddings - from Ranveer Singh marrying Deepika Padukone to Priyanka Chopra saying Yes to Nick Jonas, this year has been special.
Twitter
In the midst of celebrities tying the knot, there has been another special couple who have come closer to each other and totally enjoying the new found attention. We're talking about Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora.
The duo who were avoiding the paps and shies away from shutterbugs are now declaring love for each other. In a recent episode of Koffee With Karan, Arjun revealed he has found someone special and wants to settle down.
Twitter
Don't Miss 106 SHARES 7.6 K SHARES
Next day, Karan Johar asked Malaika if she liked the 'Koffee' from last night , clearly in reference to the episode and her reply confirmed the relationship status. She said, "It was hot, brewing and I loved every bit of it."
The love birds were also spotted partying last night. Arjun joined rumoured girlfriend Malaika and her gang of girls for a house party at Amrita's residence.
The two were clicked separately but we all know what's brewing the hottest couple in town.
Taimur was also accompanied by Bebo for the party.
Will there be a wedding in 2019, only time will tell.
